@Gizmo_12
It's ok that files with extension .r30 .r31... don't have RAR icon, because only file extensions .rar .r00 .r01 .... .r29 are associated with the RAR application.
You don't need to click on any RAR file except first - the one with the .rar extension (all other RAR parts that follow will be processed automatically).
Also, if there is any corrupt (or missing) RAR file you will get an error message, otherwise - everything is ok.

**PHOTOSHOP CS6 EXTENDED**

- Install Photoshop CS6 (with original amtlib.dll)
- Start Photoshop
- Close Photoshop
- Copy cracked amtlib.dll to Photoshop CS6 program folder
- Start Photoshop again (it should now be Extended version)

MISSING PREMIERE CS6  PRESET / CODEC PROBLEM SOLVED /////


This solution worked for me, I can't promise it will work for everyone.. try it out guys:

1) Uninstall Premiere CS6
2) Reinstall Premiere CS6
3) Open Premiere once and click 'continue trial', then close the program.
4) Delete the file: ' /program files (x86)/common files/adobe/adobe pcd/cache/cache.db'
5) Apply the cracked .dll file


All presets/codecs should now be working

To transform Photoshop CS6 into Extended, follow these steps (yes, it really works):

1. Restore amtlib.dll in the Photoshop folder, i.e. put the original dll file back here.
2. Disconnect from Internet (Right click the adapter in Network Connections and choose Disable)
3. Launch Photoshop.
4. You will be asked if you want to start the trial. Choose Accept.
5. Voilà! You know have Photoshop Extended! You can see the difference at the splash screen. The splash is decorated with blue paint strokes and splats instead of blue transparent bubbles.
6. Close Photoshop.
7. Replace the original amtlib.dll with the cracked one.
8. Reconnect to the Internet (right click adapter, choose Enable)
9. Launch Photoshop and enjoy! It's now permanently Extended version!

Ok - so I've been running into the same issue on both Windows and Mac...which is that Camera RAW does NOT work through Bridge.

ie - Open Bridge, right click a .RAW file or .JPG and select "Open in Camera Raw"...

The error received is "Camera Raw Editing is not enabled / Camera Raw Editing requires that a qualifying product has been launched at least once to enable this feature."

I have been Googling the shit out of this and have thus far not found a working solution. If anyone has a recent work around for this - please post it!

Cheers and thanks for the UP.

Works perfectly if you follow the steps above, but be aware that the installer will put some programs in Program Files (X86)/Adobe and others in just Program Files/Adobe.

Also, if you copied the 64-bit crack file and can't get the program to load (it just gives you an error before you even see the loading screen), replace it with the 32-bit.  This confused me because my computer's a 64-bit system, but most of the programs wouldn't run without the 32-bit amtlib.dll file.  Cheers and thanks to AncientRome, appreciate the upload!
does it include mocha pro?

Camera Raw Editing Disabled Error FIX!!!

For those who have JUST installed master collection cs6 and are experiencing an error when editing images from bridge in camera raw heres a fix...(note: this fix may only work if you havent restarted your computer since installing cs6 or updated anything since)

1.To fix first install as a trial using original dll( do not copy/ ovewrite dll's after installation instead just open photoshop and run as a 30 day trial)


2.After opening Photshop open an imagefile and make some changes then open minibridge(optional)

3.Open Bridge then test it by opening a file in camera raw( it should work)

4. Now you can close bridge and photoshop and copy the cracked dll's to their appropriate folders to replace the originals

5. Thats it now it should work and you shouldn't get that annoying error anymore. 


***For those who this doesn't work for its due to the fact that you restarted your computer after the installation and some of the files got changed. Due to the fact that the dll file reads and rights to a text code run file. with the paths that﻿ are reset after an update/or registration /restart. i am unsure with this text file is. but making a backup of all dll files and textrun files would be ideal.***

(otherwise you would have to do a complete uninstall and reinstallation of photoshop and bridge to get back to the original untouched stage)

I have a serious problem with Adobe Media Encoder which may or may not have anything to do with this torrent. At least maybe some of you have experienced the same problem and managed to work it out.

I tried reinstalling Premiere Pro, opening it as a trial (which is the way to get your presets for Premiere), then opened AME but still no go. Then I replaced the amtlib.dll for both apps, but still nothing.
